lines.text:
[Tied to a walnut tree after after ruining Wal and Cheeky's date]
You think you can break my spirit, do you Wal Footrot? Well, you're not dealing with rubbish here, mate. The blood of the Grey Ghost flows in these veins! I got one thing to say to you Wal Footrot.

[after closing his cupboard, stuff on top falls on him]
Ah, shit!
